titles.title: To repeal the reservation of mineral rights made by the United States when certain lands in Livingston Parish, Louisiana, were conveyed by Public Law 102-562.
To repeal the reservation of mineral rights made by the United States when certain lands in Livingston Parish, Louisiana, were conveyed by Public Law 102-562.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Mineral Resources.

bill.summary: Repeals the reservation of mineral rights made by the United States when certain lands in Livingston Parish, Louisiana, were conveyed.
